articles.author: John Miller, Celina  Tebor
articles.title: Secret Service traced swatting threats against officials. They found 300 servers capable of crippling New York’s cell system - CNN
articles.description: A Secret Service unit set out to unmask the layers of burner phones, changing phone numbers and SIM cards that were swatting American officials. It ended with the largest seizure of SIM servers and cards they’ve ever seen.
articles.content: On Christmas Day 2023, a man called the suicide prevention hotline claiming he had shot his girlfriend and threatening to kill himself. Police barreled toward the address but turned around before the… [+4425 chars]
